text: Hagi Monafi sondia vahe'mofo hankavenentake Ra Anumzamo'a huno, Kasnampa vahe'mo'zama kasnampa kema nehaza nanekea ontahiho. Na'ankure tamagrikura knare huta manigahaze hu'za havi kasnampa nanekea nehaze. Ana nanekema nehazana Ra Anumzamo'na Nagra osu'noa naneke nehazanki, zamagra'a antahintahifinti havige huza ava'nagna zana ke'none huza nehaze.
